Package io.sphere.sdk.products

Provides model classes and builders for products.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AttributeContainer
    A container for attributes.
    Product
    A sellable good.
    ProductCatalogData
    For construction you can use the ProductCatalogDataBuilder.
    ProductData
    For construction in unit tests use ProductDataBuilder.
    ProductDraft
    A template for a new Product.
    ProductIdentifiable
    Special role to pass the id of a Product or ProductProjection since Identifiable can only be implemented for one of them.
    ProductProjection
    A projected representation of a product shows the product with its current or staged data.
    ProductVariant  
    ProductVariantAvailability  
    ProductVariantDraft  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Price
    Amount that must be paid when buying goods.
    PriceBuilder  
    ProductBuilder
    Builds test doubles1 for products.
    ProductCatalogDataBuilder  
    ProductDataBuilder  
    ProductDraftBuilder  
    ProductVariantBuilder  
    ProductVariantDraftBuilder  
    VariantIdentifier
    Identifies a ProductVariant.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ProductProjectionType  
    ProductUpdateScope  

Package io.sphere.sdk.products Description

Provides model classes and builders for products.
